item.title: Google Analytics And SEO
item.description: Google Analytics Followed Hugo documents, I’d like to implement some extra features on my blog site such as GA. Here are description about GA: Google Analytics lets you measure your advertising ROI as well as track your Flash, video, and social networking sites and applications. Registration Google for Google Analyticsï¼Œlogin in using personal google account1. Add an user then create an application of website, it would generate a tracking id after choose data stream.
